attributes.action: concentrate his efforts on helping the people of the countries of which he is Prime Minister.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair should be trying to make changes to laws that affect the people of England, Scotland, Wales and Ireland; leaving the rest of the world alone. We desperately need help in so many spheres of our lives: after all, we elected him, not anyone else!
There are too many things to mention here that require urgent attention, so will not try to list them.

Tony Blair's legacy should be home-based, before it is too late.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/homelessness/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
